ca.corefacility.gview.map.items

Interface ShapeItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener, MapComponent, MapItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackboneShapeItem, FeatureItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneShapeItem, AbstractShapeItem, BasicBackboneItem, BasicItem, BorderItem, FeatureItemImp, LabelLineItem, PlotItem

    public interface ShapeItem
extends MapItem
    Describes an item on the map which has a shape.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau
